data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Arauca, Colombia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arauca, Colombia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Arauca, Colombia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.section_summary: On average, 43 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Arauca, Colombia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Arauca to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 243,802 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Siripu people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Arauca, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Arauca, Colombia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Arauca words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
